Package game

Class Skill

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Skill
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FiscalParadiseSkill, InvestorSkill, NegociatorSkill
    public abstract class Skill
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a basic Skill object, used to improve the capacities of a Player.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private int currentLevel
      The current level of this Skill
      private int ID
      The identifier of this Skill object
      private int levelCost
      The cost to upgrade the level of this Skill
      private int TOTAL_LEVELS
      The total number of levels this Skill

    • Constructor Summary

      Skill​(int ID, int TOTAL_LEVELS)

    • Constructor Detail

      • Skill

        public Skill​(int ID,
             int TOTAL_LEVELS)
        Instantiates a new Skill object with a given identifier and total number of levels of upgrade. The current level of the skill is initialized to 0 and the level cost initial value is up to any sub class of Skill.
        Parameters:
        ID - the identifier of the newly instantiated Skill object
        TOTAL_LEVELS - the total number of levels of upgrade of the newly instantiated Skill object

    • Method Detail

      • increaseLevel

        public boolean increaseLevel​(Player player)
        Increases the level of upgrade of this Skill object if the Skill is not fully upgraded and the given player has enough money to do so
        Parameters:
        player - the player that would like to increase the level of this Skill object
        Returns:
        true if the level of this Skill object increased, false otherwise

      • updateLevelCost

        public abstract void updateLevelCost()
        Updates the level cost of this skill

      • isSkillUnlocked

        public boolean isSkillUnlocked()
        Checks if the skill is unlocked
        Returns:
        true if the current level of this skill is superior to 0, false otherwise

        Gets the identifier of this Skill object

        the identifier of this Skill object

      • setLevelCost

        public void setLevelCost​(int newLevelCost)
        Sets the level cost of this skill to the given level cost.
        Parameters:
        newLevelCost - the new level cost of this skill
